text: cng kl̀āw t̄heid muḥạmmạd “khır lèā ca pkp̂xng phwk th̀ān h̄ı̂ pĥn cā kxạllxḥˌ pị dị̂ h̄āk phraxngkh̒ thrng prārt̄hnā h̄ı̂ khwām s̄eīyh̄āy kæ̀ phwk th̀ān h̄rụ̄x h̄āk phraxngkh̒ thrng prārt̄hnā h̄ı̂ khwām mettā kæ̀ phwk th̀ān” læa phwk k̄heā ca mị̀ phb khır xụ̄̀n cā kxạllxḥˌ pĕn p̄hū̂ khûmkhrxng læa pĕn p̄hū̂ ch̀wyh̄elụ̄x kæ̀ phwk k̄heā
